Introduction
This topic contains information about the exclusion of additional benefits that VA pays for UMEs when calculating VA income for SSA purposes, including
calculating VA income for SSA purposes when VA pays additional benefits for UMEs
, and
completing Part II, Section F, of
SSA Form L1103
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B - Social Security Administration (SSA) Requests for the Amount of Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) Benefits Received
citation: Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B
